divs: sighting detailsat first english is my 2nd language. was quiet long ago by now. the main thing i wanted to say compare to always what i saw on tv > it wasn't completely silence> i am protesting!!! the noise is similar than roller-blade wheels spinning all together a type of whistle... for the date> it is roughly beginning year of 2004 late afternoon early evening> my though was whoa! must go to iraq!!!...what a technology we've got here!!... then next hours and days then weeks and months, i have ever heard anything on radio or tv> nothing. so i shout my mouth, staying silence or once awhile when friends talked about "ufo" i asked about it if ever heard about a sighting in naples fl explaining; me and other drivers were at that intersection of airport rd and vanderbilt extension and the huge triangle object was going north, north east smooth flying like flooting above us on my right side and i was on north bound on the left lane ready to turn left\west stopped at the red traffic light, then when it passed green >every other drivers left keep going and i was left alone stopped sticking my head of the sun-roof opening to look at it and this when i realized and heard the sound of spinning bearings types, kind of whistling> was coming from that flooting object. i describe the sound like spinning roller-blades weeles. if anyone frm naples saw it> i'd love to talk to them> give them my email and communicate about it. thank you for your time. helene
